lore: Primarily a defensive weapon, the Firestrike Servo-turret lays down withering volleys of fire to secure flanks or the Space Marinesâ€™ base of operations. Mounted on gravitic ventral plates, they can hover across the battlefield to ideal firing positions from which to slaughter attacking enemies.

otherAbilities.name: Every model is equipped with:
otherAbilities.description: twin Firestrike las-talon; close combat weapon.

wargear.description: Any number of models can each have their twin Firestrike las-talon replaced with 1 twin Firestrike autocannon.
